resources.string: App to launch when clicking the clock.
App to launch when clicking the calendar.
App to launch when swiping right on the homescreen…
Resize any widget if desired, regardless of widget\'s capability to support resizing. May produced undesirable effects on certain widgets.
No rows to be edited. Add one by long-pressing an icon in the app drawer.
Can\'t remove last item in the list.
Would you like to remove %s from the dock?
Debug snacklets by viewing on-screen errors when invalid module data is sent.
Replace time and date with a widget
Replace the clock on the home screen with a widget.
Choose the desired widget from the menu next to the search bar.
Unable to start an app. It may be uninstalled/upgrading.
Let us show your commonly used apps in the bottom bar by enabling Usage Access for Curveball. The launcher will work without this, but it won\'t deliver many (if any) suggestions.
App to show in suggestions bar when charging.
App to show in suggestions bar when running low on power.
App to show in suggestions bar when on a phone call.

Thanks for downloading our beta! We\'re still in the early stages, but we think you\'ll love what we\'ve built. It\'s completely different from any launcher you\'ve probably used before, so you should probably watch the tutorial (see below; it\'s short, don\'t worry). Feel free to email us with bugs, feature requests, feedback, and support questions at support@justpage.me. Thanks!
Cheer up! We have swipe-y gestures and pretty colors.
No rows to batch open. Add one by long pressing on an icon in the app drawer.
Check this bock if your device is accidentally recognized as tablet, but it\'s really a phone (rare; mostly affects devices with build.prop modifications).
A suggested app because you\'re in a calendar event.
A suggested app because you\'re in a call.
A suggested app because of your battery\'s status.
Fetch launcher icons when we start. Provides a better experience, but may harm startup performance on low-end devices.
Max amount needed to move between each element of swipe view.
Tap to view software used in creating this product.

To suggest apps in the bottom bar when you\'re on phone calls, in calendar events, or running low on battery, we\'d lke permission to view your phone and calendar state. We\'d also like permission to get your location to show your local weather.
Drag a shorcut by the handle to reorder it, and swipe it away (like a notification) to remove it.
Store app not installed on this phone.
If you\'re not developing Curveball, don\'t worry about this.
Drag start; should delete and start drag
Allow the homescreen to rotate. May cause issues.
That widget is no longer valid.
Would you like to remove %s and prevent it from showing up again?
Use celcius instead of farenheight for the weather temperature.
App to launch when clicking on the current weather conditions.
Error getting weather -- is location on and are you connected?
This app does not have info.
